post.author: 조영학
post.content:
GLOBAL CONSULTING GROUP INC.
195 Main Street North Markham, Ontario L3P 1Y4
http://www.globalrecruit.com

Candidate Registration #41333
Electronic Resume Date Status: 08/23/05

Hello Joseph,

As a registered member of Global Consulting Group Inc., I would like
to inform you of a present opportunity that may be of interest.  If
you are available and/or interested in pursuing this opportunity, or
know anyone that would be, please reply back or forward the
opportunity to a friend.

**We are working with one of our National Personnel Associates (NPA)
partners on this requirement**

Present Opportunity:

Position:  Senior Oracle 11i Financials Analyst
Location:  Toronto, ON
Type:  Permanent
Salary:  $70-90K
Description:
Providing solutions  using Oracle financials 11i GL/AP/AR/FA modules.
Set out scheduling and budgeting for the delivery of solutions.
Determine and provide specs and develop applications.
Handle problems and devise means to improve applications.
Train and mentor the Oracle developers.
10 years providing elegant solutions in a solutions focused
department.
Background in Order Management.
Experience in Solutions Delivery methodology based on Oracle
Financials 11i.
Ability to use Oracle tools towards analysis and development of
solutions delivery.
Current re principles of information architecture, data management.
web development.
Strong project , time management , and communication skills.
This is a permanent position entailing both implementation and
application.

Please refer to posting #NPA1340 when responding and please include a
minimum salary requirement.

Please respond to:  Bill Johnson  at bill@globalrecruit.com

Thank you in advance for your response.  Candidates most suited for
this opportunity will be contacted.

We welcome any resume updates or referrals.

Regards,

Bill Johnson
Director of Operations
GLOBAL CONSULTING GROUP INC.
bill@globalrecruit.com
http://www.globalrecruit.com/
post.title: Oracle Application Analyst
